items.preText: Welcome back. WATCH - Highlights of Paul Stirling's blistering century (US and Caribbean only)
items.text: length ball angling away, tucked into the leg side
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball on middle and off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: nice and full on off, he gets a good stride in as he defends
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: once again solidly defended back
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: works this into the gap at midwicket to get off the mark
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: gets onto the front foot and squirts this into the off side
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slips this length ball down leg, hits the keeper on the shin as he looks to collect it on the bounce
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: tucks this gently into the leg side
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: punched well but straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: poor ball, slips this down leg and he tickles this to beat fine leg. Easy pickings. Couldn't have asked for an easier delivery early in the innings
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: half-volley on the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: punched straight to extra cover
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, no run

items.text: tucks this nicely off his hip behind square, down to long leg
items.shortText: McCarthy to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: down leg, looks to glances, may have brushed the pad along the way
items.shortText: Adair to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

items.text: length ball outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: gets a good stride in and defends
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: rides the bounce and turns it back down the pitch
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: scorching extra cover drive! Didn't try to over-hit this half-volley, just opened the bat face a wee bit and laced it between cover and point
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: driven straight to cover point
items.shortText: Adair to Liton Das, no run

items.text: slants a length balls across, defended from the crease
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: just a hint of width and he cracks this behind point. Terrific shot
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: slants one across the left-hander, watched through to the keeper
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: driven straight to extra cover
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: midwicket dives over the ball, can't stop this flick
items.shortText: McCarthy to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
